channel.title: Guwahati,Cities on NewsStreet | News portal
channel.description: Recent content in Guwahati,Cities on NewsStreet | News portal

item.title: One held for theft by West Guwahati Police District
item.description: One held for theft by West Guwahati Police District A West Guwahati Police District (WGPD) surprise naka party from Bharalumukh and Jalukbari PS arrested one Sajid Ahmed of Garigaon

item.title: Gold biscuits seized, one arrested by Government Railway Police
item.description: Gold biscuits seized, one arrested by Government Railway Police Government Railway Police (GRP) on Tuesday arrested a person who was trying to smuggle gold biscuits.

item.title: CID, Assam Police arrest OC of Dhula PS for extending undue favour to accused
item.description: CID, Assam Police arrest OC of Dhula PS for extending undue favour to accused The Criminal Investigation Department (CID), Assam Police, on Tuesday arrested the Officer in-charge (OC) of Dhula Police Station

item.title: Vigilance Awareness Week, 2022 observed at PHQ, Narangi
item.description: Vigilance Awareness Week, 2022 observed at PHQ, Narangi Keeping in line with the directives of Central Vigilance Commission (CVC), Oil India Limited is observing Vigilance Awareness week at the Pipeline Headquarters (PHQ), Narangi

item.title: Minister Jayanta Mallabaruah addresses issues faced by private ITIs
item.description: Minister Jayanta Mallabaruah addresses issues faced by private ITIs Skill Entrepreneurship and Employment Department Minister Jayanta Mallabaruah called a meeting with the authorities of private ITIs at the Assam Administrative Staff College

item.title: Assam Government suspended corrupt ACS officer Kisan Kumar Sharma
item.description: Assam Government suspended corrupt ACS officer Kisan Kumar Sharma The State Government on Monday placed under suspension Kisan Kumar Sharma (ACS)

item.title: Assam Governor Prof Jagdish Mukhi greets people on Chhath Puja
item.description: Assam Governor Prof Jagdish Mukhi greets people on Chhath Puja Mukhi said, â€œI extend my heartiest greetings to the people all across the State on the pious occasion of Chhath Puja where people offer prayers to Sun God.

item.title: One electrocuted to death in Demow Palengi
item.description: One electrocuted to death in Demow Palengi A tragic incident took place in Demow Palengi 10 no line on Tuesday morning when a youth was electrocuted to death.
